scripts.test: yarn run test:front && yarn run test:back
scripts.test:front: docker-compose -p test-front -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm front yarn test
scripts.test:front:snapshots: docker-compose -p test-front -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm front yarn test -- -u
scripts.test:back: docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm node yarn test; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml stop db; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -f db
scripts.test:back:snapshots: docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm node yarn test -- -u; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml stop db; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -f db
